title: Unable to connect to the server. Please check your network connection and attempt to reconnect
body: After champion select i keep having black screen and after a while it shows me "Unable to connect to the server. Please check your network connection and attempt to reconnect to your game." Does anyone know how to fix this?

replies.body: Your network seems to have an issue connecting to the game server.  You may be able to fix this by going over the instructions in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  The guide will help you strengthen your connection as well as find areas where it might be failing.  Hopefully it will help get you back in the game asap!
